name: UpdateGroupTypeMetrics
description:
Updates metrics for a specified group type in a project.

This tool updates the metrics for a given group type in a specified project. It should be called when there's a need to modify or update the metrics associated with a group type. Useful for maintaining or adjusting project metric configurations.

parameters.name: group_type_index
parameters.description: An integer representing the index of the group type to be updated. This is required to identify which group type's metrics need modification.

parameters.name: group_usage_metric_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the group usage metric to be updated.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Use /api/projects/ to find it.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: metric_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the metric to be updated. Expect a string value.

parameters.name: metric_name
parameters.description: The name of the metric to update for the specified group type in a project.

parameters.name: filters_criteria
parameters.description: Specify criteria to filter metrics data. Use a string representation of conditions.

parameters.name: metric_format_type
parameters.description: Specifies the display format of the metric: 'numeric' for numeric values or 'currency' for currency representation.

parameters.name: interval_in_days
parameters.description: Specify the interval in days for updating metrics.

parameters.name: metric_display_type
parameters.description: Defines how the metrics are displayed. Options are 'number' or 'sparkline'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this group usage metric.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this group usage metric.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
